extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Mara nzuzo, Adblock echekwara maka YouTube™. Na-egbochi mgbasa ozi na YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Adblock maka Youtube™ echekwara ihe ruru. $savedTime$ nke ndụ gị.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Gosi ọnụọgụ arịrịọ akpọchiri na baajị
